College enrollment by percent of the U.S. population

About 6% of the total U.S. population was enrolled in college in 2020. This is a significant

increase from 1970, when only 3.5% of the population was enrolled in college.

6.8%

5.7%

In 1970, only

3.5% of the

population was enrolled in college

Source: National Center

for Education Statistics
